edu.umass.cs.surveyman.survey

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.surveyman.survey.SurveyObj
      • edu.umass.cs.surveyman.survey.Question

  • public class Question
extends SurveyObj
    The class representing a Question object. The Question object includes instructional "questions."

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Question.MalformedOptionException
      Thrown by the Parser.
      static class  Question.OptionNotFoundException
      Thrown whenever the user or system attempts to find an option by text, input cell, etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Component answer
      Answer to the question, if it exists.
      Block block
      The enclosing block for this question.
      protected BranchMap branchMap
      Map from answer options to branch destinations (Block).
      String correlation
      A correlation label.
      Component data
      Data to be displayed when the user takes the survye.
      Boolean exclusive
      True if respondents may only answer one of the answer options.
      Boolean freetext
      True if this question requires a text response.
      String freetextDefault
      Set if this question requires a text response and should display example text.
      Pattern freetextPattern
      Set if this question requires a text response and must conform to a regular expression.
      Map<String,Component> options
      Map from component identifiers to answer option objects (Component).
      Boolean ordered
      True if the answer options have a natural ordering (e.g., Likert scales).
      Map<String,String> otherValues
      Map from other input column headers to their values, when they exist for this question.
      boolean permitBreakoff
      Indicates whether respondents may submit their results immediately after answering this questions, regardless of its position in the survey.
      String quid
      Unique question identifier.
      Boolean randomize
      True if the answer options may be randomized.
      List<Integer> sourceLineNos
      Source data line numbers corresponding to this question.

    • Field Detail

      • quid

        public String quid
        Unique question identifier. Typically generated upon parsing.

      • data

        public Component data
        Data to be displayed when the user takes the survye.

      • answer

        public Component answer
        Answer to the question, if it exists.

      • options

        public Map<String,Component> options
        Map from component identifiers to answer option objects (Component).

      • branchMap

        protected BranchMap branchMap
        Map from answer options to branch destinations (Block). This may be left empty if there is no branching.

      • sourceLineNos

        public List<Integer> sourceLineNos
        Source data line numbers corresponding to this question. Used for parsing and debugging.

      • otherValues

        public Map<String,String> otherValues
        Map from other input column headers to their values, when they exist for this question.

      • block

        public Block block
        The enclosing block for this question.

      • exclusive

        public Boolean exclusive
        True if respondents may only answer one of the answer options.

      • ordered

        public Boolean ordered
        True if the answer options have a natural ordering (e.g., Likert scales).

      • randomize

        public Boolean randomize
        True if the answer options may be randomized. If the ordered field is true, then there are only two possible permutations. If the ordered field is false, there are factorial permutations in the number of options.

      • freetext

        public Boolean freetext
        True if this question requires a text response.

      • freetextPattern

        public Pattern freetextPattern
        Set if this question requires a text response and must conform to a regular expression.

      • freetextDefault

        public String freetextDefault
        Set if this question requires a text response and should display example text.

      • permitBreakoff

        public boolean permitBreakoff
        Indicates whether respondents may submit their results immediately after answering this questions, regardless of its position in the survey.

      • correlation

        public String correlation
        A correlation label.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(Component data,
        int row,
        int col)
        Used by the edu.umass.cs.surveyman.input parsers.
        Parameters:
        data - The parsed, internal representation of the data in a cell.
        row - The input row (literal or calculated, as with JSON).
        col - The input column (literal or calculated, as with JSON).

      • Question

        public Question(String data,
        int row,
        int col)
        Creates a question whose identifier is based on the question's input location and whose associated data Component is .
        Parameters:
        data - The data associated with this question.
        row - This question's initial input row index.
        col - The question column index.

      • Question

        public Question(String data,
        boolean ordered,
        boolean exclusive)
        Creates a new question object using the string data.
        Parameters:
        data - The data associated with this question.
        ordered - True if the question's responses are ordered.
        exclusive - True if the question is a radio question.

      • Question

        public Question(String data)
        Constructor for the programmatic creation of questions.
        Parameters:
        data - The data associated with this question.

    • Method Detail

      • customQuestion

        public static boolean customQuestion(String quid)
        Determines whether the input question id corresponds to a known custom question pattern. Custom questions are those that the user plugs in after parsing the input survey. They typically encompass ad hoc data such as timing information and custom freetext questions added in the course of debugging.
        Parameters:
        quid - The identifier of the question we are testing.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether the question has a known custom question id pattern.

      • makeQuestionId

        public static String makeQuestionId(int row,
                    int col)
        Creates a question identifier corresponding to the input data location.
        Parameters:
        row - This question's initial input row index.
        col - The question column index.
        Returns:
        A unique identifier based on input location.

      • updateFromSurvey

        protected void updateFromSurvey(Survey s)

      • addOption

        public void addOption(String surfaceText,
             boolean exclusive,
             boolean ordered)
               throws SurveyException
        Adds an option to the question.
        Parameters:
        surfaceText - The answer option text to display.
        exclusive - Boolean indicating whether this should be a radio button question. Must agree with the default question setting.
        ordered - Boolean indicating whether the answer options are ordered. Must agree with the default question setting.
        Throws:
        SurveyException

      • addOption

        public void addOption(String surfaceText)
               throws SurveyException
        Add an option with the input surface text.
        Parameters:
        surfaceText - The text this option should display.
        Throws:
        SurveyException

      • addOptions

        public void addOptions(String... surfaceTexts)
                throws SurveyException
        Adds options with the input surface text.
        Parameters:
        surfaceTexts - The surface texts to display.
        Throws:
        SurveyException

      • addOption

        public void addOption(Component component,
             boolean exclusive,
             boolean ordered)
               throws SurveyException
        Adds the input component as an answer option to the question.
        Parameters:
        component - The option to add.
        exclusive - Boolean indicating whether this should be a radio button question. Must agree with the default question setting.
        ordered - Boolean indicating whether the answer options are ordered. Must agree with the default question setting.
        Throws:
        SurveyException

               throws SurveyException

        Parameters:
        component - The option to add.
        Throws:
        SurveyException

      • addOption

        public void addOption(Component component,
             Block branchTo,
             boolean exclusive,
             boolean ordered)
               throws SurveyException
        Adds an answer option as part of a branch question.
        Parameters:
        component - The option to add.
        branchTo - The block this option points to.
        exclusive - Boolean indicating whether this should be a radio button question. Must agree with the default question setting.
        ordered - Boolean indicating whether the answer options are ordered. Must agree with the default question setting.
        Throws:
        SurveyException

      • addOption

        public void addOption(Component component,
             Block branchTo)
               throws SurveyException
        Adds an answer option as part of a branch question.
        Parameters:
        component - The option to add.
        branchTo - The block this option points to.
        Throws:
        SurveyException

      • getBranchDestinations

        public Set<Block> getBranchDestinations()
        Loops through the branch destinations for this question and returns the set of blocks this question branches to. If the question is not a branch question, returns an empty set.
        Returns:
        The set of blocks this question branches to.

      • isBranchQuestion

        public boolean isBranchQuestion()
        Tests whether this question is a branch question. Note that Branch-ALL types will return true here, even though they are not "true" branch questions.
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating whether this block is a branch question.

      • getBranchDest

        public Block getBranchDest(Component c)
                    throws SurveyException
        Returns the branch destination for the input question.
        Parameters:
        c - The answer option whose branch destination we want to know.
        Returns:
        The Block correponding to the branch destination.
        Throws:
        SurveyException

      • setBranchDest

        public void setBranchDest(Component c,
                 Block dest)
                   throws SurveyException
        Sets the branch destination of this question at the input option to the input destination. Adds the input option to this question's options, if it hasn't been added already. Resets the branch paradigm, if needed, and propagates the branch paradigm.
        Parameters:
        c - The answer option whose branch destination we need to set.
        dest - The branch destination for the input answer option.
        Throws:
        SurveyException

      • getOptById

        public Component getOptById(String oid)
                     throws SurveyException
        Returns the answer option associated with this question having the input Component identifier.
        Parameters:
        oid - The input Component identifier.
        Returns:
        The appropriate Component subclass.
        Throws:
        Question.OptionNotFoundException - if there is no answer option associated with this question.
        SurveyException

      • getOptListByIndex

        public Component[] getOptListByIndex()
                              throws SurveyException
        Returns a sorted array of the answer options.
        Returns:
        Component array of the answer options, sorted by their relative indices.
        Throws:
        Question.MalformedOptionException - if there is an error with the options' indices.
        SurveyException

      • before

        public boolean before(Question q)
        Tests whether this question precedes the input question, according to their enclosing blocks. See before.
        Parameters:
        q - Question to compare.
        Returns:
        true if the input question follows this question. false if randomization and/or partial ordering cannot determine a strict ordering.

      • getSourceRow

        public int getSourceRow()
        Getter for the input source line.
        Returns:
        int corresponding to the first input source line.

      • getSourceCol

        public int getSourceCol()
        Getter for the input source column. This should be the same for every question in a survey.
        Returns:
        int corresponding to the QUESTION column.

      • getVariants

        public List<Question> getVariants()
        For each question, returns the set of all equivalent questions (including itself).
        Returns:
        The list of equivalent questions. If this question is not part of a set of variants, the function will return a list containing just this question. If this question is a custom question, the function will return an empty list.

        protected String jsonize()
                  throws SurveyException
        Throws:
        SurveyException

                         throws SurveyException
        Throws:
        SurveyException

        public static void makeUnorderedRadioQuestions(Question[] questions,
                               String... surfaceStrings)
        Convenience method for quickly creating a series of questions with the default settings.
        Parameters:
        questions - An array that will be populated with new question objects.
        surfaceStrings - The strings corresponding to the text the user will see.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object o)
        Two questions are equal if the following are equal:

        • quid
        • data
        • option map
        • enclosing block
        • exclusive flag
        • ordered flag
        • randomize flag

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:

        Returns:
